name: ext_R5_ManufacturedItemDefinition_component
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ManufacturedItemDefinition.component for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ManufacturedItemDefinition.component from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ManufacturedItemDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Physical parts of the manufactured item, that it is intrisically made from. This is distinct from the ingredients that are part of its chemical makeup
element.definition: `ManufacturedItemDefinition.component` has no related element in R4B:ManufacturedItemDefinition

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children unless an empty Parameters resource
